parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts given value in radians to degrees. 1 degree equals 0.01745 radians or [[pi]] / 180.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''deg''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - radians

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - degrees
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_degrees = [[deg]] 1; // returns 57.2958</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[rad]]
</value></part></template>
